title: uLLam iranguvadun
sahitya:
uLLam iranguvadun kaDanE un padamE pughal enRadaindEn un tiru


anupallavi

  piLLai manam kalleninum ulagil peTra manam puTrenpAr
pEraruT-kaDal annaiyE aDimai pEdamaiyAl vidhiyAl pizhai purindAlum


caraNam    malayadvajan maghaLAi avataritta mAdhava sOdari mAmadurai
mahA rAgjnya mahAdEvan pangilurai mAtA shivE rAja rAjEshvari
kalai mAdum tirumangaiyum vaNangak-kolu vITrirukkum anaiyE
karuNAnidhiyE sharaNAgati tAyE karuNaik-kaN pArtthk-kAttaruL mInAkSi
